# Calculating p-value

cf https://www.cyclismo.org/tutorial/R/pValues.html

## Calculating a p-value from a normal distribution

Let's assume :

- sample mean is 5

- the standard deviation is 2

- the sample size is 20. 

```{r}
a <- 5
s <- 2
n <- 20
xbar <- 7
z <- (xbar-a)/(s/sqrt(n))
z
2*pnorm(-abs(z))
```
